metadata.title: California Wildfire Inventory (CAWFI): An Extensive Dataset for Predictive Techniques based on Artificial Intelligence
metadata.abstract: CAWFI is a wildfire database of over 34 million data points for building and training wildfire prediction solutions, thereby potentially preventing megafires and flash fires by addressing them before they spark.
metadata.purpose: To provide environmental, meteorological, geological, and ecological data for wildfire prediction.
metadata.creator: Rohan Tan Bhowmik
metadata.completeness_description: Complete wildfire data is provided from 2012 to 2018. Complete CO, NO2, PM10, PM25, TEMP, and WIND data is provided from 2012 to 2022.
